name: Sword Fighting :D
description:
Hop in the game with up to 32 friends! Please don't actually go up to 32 it will not be pretty...

The controls are like so:

  • M1 to Swing
  • M2 to Deflect
  • M1 during Swing Windup to Thrust
  • WASD to move

Controller support coming later

Make sure to comment down below to report bugs or dm GudBoiNero#6650 on discord.
